Package com.jme.input.vr

Class AbstractVRViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.input.vr.AbstractVRViewManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VRViewManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LWJGLOpenVRViewManager, OculusViewManager, OpenVRViewManager, OSVRViewManager
    public abstract class AbstractVRViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements VRViewManager
    A VR view manager. This class holds methods that enable to submit 3D views to the VR compositor. System dependent classes should extends from this one.
    Author:
    Julien Seinturier - COMEX SA - http://www.seinturier.fr
